```{.r .cell-code}
granularity <- .1
x1 = seq(from = 0, to = 1, by = granularity)
x2 = seq(from = 1, to = 0, by = -granularity)
#x2 <- 1 - x1
  
d <- expand_grid(x1, x2)
```
:::



Gini-Loss:


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
gini_loss <- function(x1, x2) {1 - (x1^2 + x2^2)}
```
:::



Funktion berechnen:



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
d2 <-
  d %>% 
  rowwise() %>% 
  mutate(y = gini_loss(x1, x2))
```
